notes: This section consists of 18 part questions and all are to be answered. Each question carries ½ mark.
Do not copy the part questions in your answerbook. Write only the answer in full against the proper number of the question and its part.

questions.question: Renal cortex produces an important hormone necessary for the synthesis of RBC's:
These joints hold the bone by dense connective tissues contain collagenous fibers:
The largest part of human Brain is:
This hormone stimulates the contraction of uterine muscles:
Skinner Box was used for:
The Hypothalamus is the part of brain contains clusters of these specialized cells:
Human embryonic development occurs in the:
These are worker Honey Bees:
Aging is characterized by:
options: Increase in the consumption of oxygen
A decrease in the metabolic activities

questions.question: The important organ for osmoregulation and excretion in human body is:
The ignorance of an animal to a repeated stimulus is called:
The outer most layer of uterus is:
The hormones of short chain amino acids are:
The cells in seminiferous tubules that produce sperms are:
The number of bones in pectoral girdles and fore limbs are:
The stimulus which is not capable to produce any response, is called:
This part of sperm contains enzyme used in penetration:
The presence stone in kidneys is called:

sections.note: Attempt any NINE part questions in all. Select FIVE Reasoning Questions and FOUR Non-Reasoning Questions. All part questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: How do aquatic osmoregulator animals overcome the osmoregulatory problems?
Why receptors are called Transducers?
Why inner uterus wall thickens during secretory phase?
Why testes descend down in human male foetus before birth?
Why monozygotic twins having same sex?
Why are skeletal muscles get fatigued while cardiac muscles do not?
Why does the pancreas function as both kinds of endocrine and exocrine gland?
Why three spined stickleback fish shows aggressive behavior?
Differentiate miscarriage and abortion.
Write note on Rubella or abnormal Neural Tube Defects (NTDs).
Write the names, causes and symptoms of disorders of Urinary Tract.
Write a note on autonomic nervous system.
Write any two skeletal disorder of man.
Name any four releasing and inhibiting hormones of Hypothalamus.
What is taxis? Give their types with examples.

sections.note: Attempt any TWO question from this section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: Define Skeletal Muscles. Describe the mechanisms of contraction of skeletal muscles with the help of diagram.
Define Nerve Impulse. Explain resting membrane potential, actional potential, depolarization, repolarization and synapse.
What is Nephron? Describe the functions of nephron with the help of diagram.
questions.alternative: OR—Explain the stages of development in human in terms of first, second and third Trimester.
